channel.title: HELP if you know the fix
channel.description:
The problem is(Source: PI):
Everyones playing happily and all of a sudden i view my terminal window and this happens:
[DEREGISTERED]playername Game saved for playername [DEREGISTERED]playername Game saved for playername [DEREGISTERED]playername Game saved for playername [DEREGISTERED]playername Game saved for playername ....
So about 130 out of 150 players disconnect, then they CAN log right back on.
Really strange problem.
VPS Connectivity is 100mbps, 2GB RAM.
Thank-you. :)

item.title: HELP if you know the fix
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

look for: “deregistered” using zfilesearcher in your source, if u found something post it here.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP if you know the fix

item.title: HELP if you know the fix
item.dc:creator: @PEN_R PEN()R
item.description:
@PEN_R wrote:

TheCyberMan:

Check the character files of those people. If those are fine I have no clue what else would’ve caused this (besides a random in-game glitch).

it’s not something with characterfiles just because 10% of server survives unDC’ed.

Seems like Java Heap space is kind of effecting the problem, currently my vps has 2GB RAM, and my heap space is set to -Xmx1280m. It was at -Xmx504m and the restarts were happening every 30-60 seconds, now when i’ve changed it to 1280m in 1 hour, 1 dc has happened.

Make sure the UID of the client that they're on is the UID of what the server allows.

Every play is on my official client that is allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP if you know the fix
